titleStmt.title: The godly garden of Gethsemani furnished with holsome fruites of meditation and prayer, vpon the blessed passion of Christ our Redeemer.
titleStmt.author: Loarte, Gaspar.

notesStmt.note: An edition of: Loarte, Gaspar. The godlie garden of Gethsemani.
Printer's name from and publication date conjectured by STC.
Identified as STC 11803a on UMI microfilm reel 644.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
